Package dreisoft.tresos.generator.ng.api.cds.struct

This package provides functions relative to Structs.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AlignmentMemberSorter
    A IMemberSorter implementation that sorts the struct members by their alignments requirements in descending order (starting with the largest alignment requirement).
    SizeMemberSorter
    A IMemberSorter implementation that sorts the struct members by their allocated sizes in descending order (starting with the biggest size).

Package dreisoft.tresos.generator.ng.api.cds.struct Description

This package provides functions relative to Structs.
